doc:
David Burke (British actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Burke_(British_actor) 0 David Burke (born 25 May 1934) is an English actor, known for playing Watson in the initial series of Granada Television's 1980s The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes, which starred Jeremy Brett in the title role. He also starred as Josef Stalin in the last two episodes of Reilly, Ace of Spies. David_Burke ( born 25_May_1934 ) is an_English_actor , known for playing_Watson in the_initial_series of Granada_Television 's_1980s The_Adventures of Sherlock_Holmes , which starred Jeremy_Brett in the_title_role . He also starred as Josef_Stalin in the_last_two_episodes of Reilly , Ace of Spies .
